column1: - You may have swelling in your foot after surgery.
Make sure you put weight on your heel but not on your toes.
You will have a bandage on your foot that will be changed about 2 weeks after surgery, when your stitches are removed.

For pain, you can you can buy these pain medicines without a prescription: - Ibuprofen (such as Advil or Motrin) - Naproxen (such as Aleve or Naprosyn) - Acetaminophen (such as Tylenol) If you use pain medicine: - Talk with your provider before using these medicines if you have heart disease, high blood pressure, kidney disease, liver disease, or have had stomach ulcers or bleeding.
